operations.description:
Create column iiif_id at index 6 based on column redirect_url using expression jython:import re
return re.findall('[0-9]+$', value)[0]
Create column image_url at index 7 based on column iiif_id using expression jython:return "https://ids.lib.harvard.edu/ids/iiif/{}/full/full/0/default.jpg".format(value)

Create column size_info at index 10 based on column print_info using expression jython:import re
return re.sub('[A-Z]{2} .*', '', value)

Create column topic_id at index 13 based on column topic using expression jython:import re
return re.sub(" ", "_", value).lower()

Text transform on cells in column topic_id using expression jython:import re
return re.sub(",", "", value)
